title: Understanding the CASE Statement
text: The CASE statement in SQL is used to implement conditional logic. It allows you to perform different actions based on different conditions within a query.

hintAnswer: It allows for conditional logic to be applied within a query.
title: Purpose of CASE statement
text: What is the purpose of the CASE statement in SQL?
choices: It allows for conditional logic to be applied within a query.
It is used to join two tables together.
It is used to create a new table.
It is used to delete records from a table.
